mapper.insert: insert into sc_party_activities (id, topic_id, party_id, title, description, start_time, content, comment, duration, activity_status, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=REAL}, #{activityStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sc_party_activities set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=REAL}, activity_status = #{activityStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and party_id = #{partyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, topic_id, party_id, title, description, start_time, content, comment, duration, activity_status, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, modify_time from sc_party_activities
